verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* called unto Moses , and spake unto him out of the tabernacle of the congregation , saying ,

Speak unto the children of Israel , and say unto them, If any man of you bring an offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye shall bring your offering of the cattle , \add even\add* of the herd , and of the flock. \p

If his offering \add be\add* a burnt sacrifice of the herd , let him offer a male without blemish : he shall offer it of his own voluntary will at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
And he shall put his hand upon the head of the burnt offering ; and it shall be accepted for him to make atonement for him.

And he shall kill the bullock before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the priests , Aaron’s sons , shall bring the blood , and sprinkle the blood round about upon the altar that \add is by\add* the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
And he shall flay the burnt offering , and cut it into his pieces.
And the sons of Aaron the priest shall put fire upon the altar , and lay the wood in order upon the fire :
And the priests , Aaron’s sons , shall lay the parts , the head , and the fat , in order upon the wood that \add is\add* on the fire which \add is\add* upon the altar :

But his inwards and his legs shall he wash in water : and the priest shall burn all on the altar , \add to be\add* a burnt sacrifice , an offering made by fire , of a sweet savour unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ And if his offering \add be\add* of the flocks , \add namely\add*, of the sheep , or of the goats , for a burnt sacrifice ; he shall bring it a male without blemish.
And he shall kill it on the side of the altar northward before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the priests , Aaron’s sons , shall sprinkle his blood round about upon the altar.
And he shall cut it into his pieces , with his head and his fat : and the priest shall lay them in order on the wood that \add is\add* on the fire which \add is\add* upon the altar :

But he shall wash the inwards and the legs with water : and the priest shall bring \add it\add* all, and burn \add it\add* upon the altar : it \add is\add* a burnt sacrifice , an offering made by fire , of a sweet savour unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ And if the burnt sacrifice for his offering to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add be\add* of fowls , then he shall bring his offering of turtledoves , or of young pigeons.

And the priest shall bring it unto the altar , and wring off his head , and burn \add it\add* on the altar ; and the blood thereof shall be wrung out at the side of the altar :\f + \fr 1.15 \ft wring…: or, pinch off the head with the nail\f*
And he shall pluck away his crop with his feathers , and cast it beside the altar on the east part , by the place of the ashes :\f + \fr 1.16 \ft his feathers: or, the filth thereof\f*

And he shall cleave it with the wings thereof, \add but\add* shall not divide \add it\add* asunder : and the priest shall burn it upon the altar , upon the wood that \add is\add* upon the fire : it \add is\add* a burnt sacrifice , an offering made by fire , of a sweet savour unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
